ComicInfo.Title: Three Black Hearts
ComicInfo.Summary:
A man called Stockton captures a witch and forces her to serve him. Their daughter takes on the role after her mother kills herself. Stockton finds his daughter with a lover and kills him. She takes revenge by sacrificing the hearts of her father, her stepmother and stepbrother in order to revive her lover.
Vinyr attempts to reprogram Jason's mind however Bast is able to infiltrate his memories. D'Mer assumes Rieken's identity and interrupts Sere's funeral and Liana's ascension with demands from the Resistance. Niniri threatens to destroy Earth instead.
